Interface BundleSpec

All Known Subinterfaces:
Application, LinuxApplication, LinuxDebPackage, LinuxPackage, LinuxRpmPackage, MacApplication, MacDmgPackage, MacPackage, MacPkgPackage, Package, WinApplication, WinExePackage, WinMsiPackage
All Known Implementing Classes:

A generic bundle specification.
